How many people are affected by Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome ?,Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome is a rare condition; its incidence is unknown.,GHR,Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome ?,"Mutations in the ABHD5 gene cause Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome. The ABHD5 gene provides instructions for making a protein that turns on (activates) the ATGL enzyme, wh
